bio.short: Rupak Ganguly is an Enterprise Advocate at Serverless, Inc.
bio.long: Rupak Ganguly is an Enterprise Advocate at Serverless, Inc., striving to take the excitement around serverless into the enterprises. I tend to achieve that by working with the community, the enterprise developers & thought leaders. It is my belief that we can drive innovation, cultivate a faster go-to-market strategy with low TCO by investing in the serverless movement.
